DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate bioequivalence administration HIP1403 HGP0919 suspension healthy male volunteer .
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , open-label , single dose , crossover clinical trial investigate compare pharmacokinetics HIP1403 HGP0919 suspension healthy male volunteer .
